name: Bittiriihi Oy
goal:
Bittiriihi is the holding company of ICT companies in Bitcomp group www.bitcomp.com.
Bittiriihi is financing and coordinating R&D projects in Bitcomp subsidiaries
Bitcomp Oy, Finland
Bitcomp Spzoo, Poland
Bitcomp GmbH, Germany
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Bitcomp subsidiaries hosting ICT services related to General Data Protection Regulation GDPR
